Something I kept wondering about as a Rwse n as an African when I heard about it ..
In 2 difrnt incidents 1-a person from europe who worked in difrnt countries in Africa said that he was missing 1 of the countries bcause ..
Of that country's Africanness ...and he said in Rw.things r orderly,clean,there s discpline etc etc he currently lives in Rw.!
Some1 challenged him asked if being,clean,orderly n discplnd is not African ..he changed and said thts not what he meant n kind of apologisd
As if that was not enough I met a gd African from a neighboring country a couple of months latr who told me a similar story from other ppl
Also from europe who had been visiting tht country and bcz he knos Rw.these were his friends,he asked them also to visit Rw.for a difrnt ...
Perspective ...and they obliged! On their return to that country n their frnd he asked what they had seen..he told me he was taken aback..
They spoke negatively about cleanliness,order,modernisation going on even in rural areas ..again to mean..not African!!! These were commnts
Made by dfrnt pple at difrnt times from 2 dfrnt countries in Eur. SO what s this about being African or not or less ...!???
In my opinion..let Rw.or Africa be the best place(s) they can n their pple want them to be ,,! Unfrtntly we lag behind .....!!!
